website_summaries.verdict: Great catcher's helmet for adult and older youth players with adjustable padding to ensure a proper fit.
pros: Uses multiple ventilation slots throughout the helmet to ensure the catcher can stay cool
Steel mask extends to the chin area to provide additional protection
Excellent level of foam padding throughout the helmet
Available in seven different color options
cons: Back of the helmet may not fit each catcher just right and may pop loose under stress

customer_reviews.title: For a catcher's helmet that is so lightweight and comfortable it offers excellent protection
customer_reviews.text: Not long after purchasing this helmet I was involved in a full-speed collision that knocked me backward into the next zip code. I've seen some reviews for the G4 Samurai that say it's light on protection, but let me say for the record that even though the point of contact was mostly my head there was no concussion, and no head injury. The helmet stayed on and did it's job. For a catcher's helmet that is so lightweight and comfortable it offers excellent protection!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Love this helmet
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer umpire for Little league from the 10-11 age bracket all the way through Senior Division. I transitioned from the standard mask to this helmet for the added protection due to the types of backstops we sometimes encounter in youth sports (many will return a foul ball at high speed from above or behind). This helmet has been very comfortable in hot weather and I find that I am a bit more relaxed behind the plate with it. I know some will not wear a hat under the helmet but I personally wear the short bill plate hat under this helmet. It works great, easy to remove without pulling off your hat. All around good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, fits well
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this for my daughter who is an All-Star catcher in our local softball league. Not only does it look great on her, she says it is comfortable and strong. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality and construction!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice helmet. Great quality and construction. The darker metal face grill is stylish too. It was a little tight on my daughters head but the doctor has told us big heads run in the family. lol I loosened the straps as far as I could and she's broke it in. She likes it.
customer_reviews.author: April Dujanovic

customer_reviews.title: First day Broken Clip
customer_reviews.text: Clips in the back are plastic! First time out, mask comes off, clip gets broken. I had to use the metal clips from his old Easton helmet to fix it. Seems like a decent helmet. I like the chin pad better than his Easton(the Velcro came off his old helmet) but at least it had metal clips for durability. It’s fixed but I shouldn’t have to fix a day old helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this catchers set for my daughter and the helmet cushions have torn and its falling apart, for the cost of the set I think the quality should be alot better! Won't be purchasing again
customer_reviews.author: Carin Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: ... that the snaps on the back come off somewhat easily. They popped off a few times during my ...
customer_reviews.text: A few minor complaints are that the snaps on the back come off somewhat easily. They popped off a few times during my daughter's games. There's also not much room for adjustment. We also changed out the chin pad with the one from her old helmet. The one that comes with it was too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality as always
customer_reviews.text: Great catcher's helmet. I've been happy and impressed with the quality of all the Mizuno gear we've purchased over the years. The latest incarnation, the G4 Samurai, is no exception and has been my son's favorite helmet out of all the others he has used over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Y

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, looks better.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 10yr old. Fits great, looks better, hopefully it protects just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Pauling

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Helmet
customer_reviews.text: This looks to be a great Helmet. Can't wait to see it in action. Has great padding inside and is very comfortable. Will team it up with G3 Shin Guards and Chest Protector. Great combination.
customer_reviews.author: Jr

customer_reviews.title: good mask
customer_reviews.text: its not perfect compared to pro stuff (which is the five star standard) but I actually really like it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent catcher's helmet. A++
customer_reviews.text: My nephew used these for the first time last week for his game and, although his team lost, he loved the fit, comfort and protection the Misuno catcher's gear afforded him.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl & Norma Wilson

customer_reviews.title: will update after use
customer_reviews.text: bought product for my softball pitcher, i will update the review after its used. just wanted to give y'll better pictures of the product for now.
customer_reviews.author: Luke B.

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet. I would like to see a better ...
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. I would like to see a better quality snap/connection for the back half of the helmet to the front.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Utah

customer_reviews.title: Works good but a little on the heavy side
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. Works good but a little on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: mine is pretty tight on my face around the
customer_reviews.text: maybe buy a size larger than you think you need? idk, mine is pretty tight on my face around the jaw
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable fit. Extremely light weight and no blind spots. Very affordable
customer_reviews.author: Sara slater

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Love how it protects my head and very visible to make calls. The problem is the cushion under the helmet. The sweat make it loose and it starts to detach from the helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Adoniram J. Iglesias Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality mask
customer_reviews.text: Great for smaller adult head. Very comfortable & super protective. Easy to adjust & good vision through mask.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool helment, and it doesn't obstruct my daughters vision. She notes the inside cushion really feels good and keeps her helment from swishing around. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: C. Clarkin

customer_reviews.title: We looked around at other masks and my granddaughter liked this one the most
customer_reviews.text: We looked around at other masks and my granddaughter liked this one the most. She says it's comfortable and fits well
customer_reviews.author: Bob Dyche

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This catchers helmet fits my 13 yr old daughter perfect. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.text: The fit was good. Covers the throat area very well.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Bittle

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet
customer_reviews.text: The first one was used for 3 years. No problems. Daughter loves the helmet and wanted the same one.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett

customer_reviews.title: Great yourh helmet
customer_reviews.text: Fits great for my son and provides good protection with good site lines. Light weight and good style. Tough to put a throat guard on it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kobs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great helmet! It's easy to put on. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon A Alberg

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Helmet looked exactly like we expected. Ship time was not as long as they expected, which was great.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Blocker

customer_reviews.title: The chin pad is way more comfortable than my last one
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. The chin pad is way more comfortable than my last one.
customer_reviews.author: Top Gun

customer_reviews.title: Great for high school ages!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product!!! I bought mine for the high school player in my life and it was a perfect size. The weight is also lighter than other helmets we have tried... but still servicing him with great protection!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter feels comfortable in the helmet, I have tried it on and wore it to practice with her. It adjusts easily. She has the other Mizuno Samurai catcher's gear pieces... it is very stylish looking and made very well.
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: Great for catchers
customer_reviews.text: The only negative comment I can give about this helmet is that the red does not match the red on chest protector or knee pads other than that, looks good on my catcher. He doesn't give any complains wearing it or yanking it off.
customer_reviews.author: Yara Santos - OUaT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Catchers Face Mask!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome mask! My 12-year-old son finds it easy to put on and throw off when needed. It is well built and definitely worth the money we paid. I would recommend this for anyone, from Little League on up.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! Great protection and very comfortable. The padding in this helmet is extensive. Good venting as well.
customer_reviews.author: Science Guy

customer_reviews.title: Protection is Key
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of Mizuno products on the field. From the past, I have used the Mizuno old school face mask. I have been hit on the side of the face where the old school mask could not protect. Now i have his hockey style helmet, i don't have to worry about getting hit on the side of the face knowing that the helmet protects your whole face. Plus this one is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: KZ ICE

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno G4 Catcher's Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Product is comfortable, lightweight, durable, and has great visibility. It offers complete protection and stays in place after foul balls as well as when making throws to the bases.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Paul

customer_reviews.title: Awesome catchers helmet. Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The mask is very light and nice. Also its very comfortable. Great periferal vision. Prefer you to buy the helmet
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really enjoys this mask. It fits her great, she says it is super confortable and it looks really clean.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Perez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit properly and catches on my daughters chest protector when she turns her head. We are not able to make the helmet fit snug so it slips around and blocks her view. I would not recommend this helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Stromenger

customer_reviews.title: For Son
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't had a chance to wear this helmet. It fits him well. Mizuno is the brand my son likes. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Mask is good, screws were loose and I lost one!
customer_reviews.text: The mask seems to be pretty good quality but the very FIRST time I used this mask one of the screws fell out. Unfortunately I lost the screw and when I came home I found out most the the screws were in fact loose. Very disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: Cole Waldron

product_meta.title: Mizuno G4 Samurai Catcher's Helmet
product_meta.description: Our top selling gear series, we build the Samurai with high quality materials made for the serious catcher that demands performance. We offer this series in many colors to make sure you have the chance to look and feel like a Pro no matter what field you're playing on.
feature_bullets: Crafted with feedback from the game's top players

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
